thread.title: Comcast cash bid may spark Fox shareholder revolt

title: Comcast cash bid may spark Fox shareholder revolt
text:
Comcast cash bid may spark Fox shareholder revolt 6:32am EDT - 01:55
Comcast's planned all-cash offer for 21st Century Fox assets could drive a wedge between media mogul Rupert Murdoch who wants a stock deal so he can avoid a huge tax bill and his investors who prefer a higher dollar transaction. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Comcast's planned all-cash offer for 21st Century Fox assets could drive a wedge between media mogul Rupert Murdoch who wants a stock deal so he can avoid a huge tax bill and his investors who prefer a higher dollar transaction.
